localised_description: Coming from their lairs, the Skaven invade! Send these pests back to their fetid nests!
Your majesty, it is wise to construct certain buildings. Their function will be of use in the coming rituals and will ensure success in taking back control of the Black Pyramid.

More warriors are needed, sire. For us to enact the greatness we desire it is time to raise a new legion.\n\nLearn more about raising armies [[url:script_link_campaign_raising_forces]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_raising_forces}}]][[col:help_page_link]]here[[/col]][[/tooltip]][[/url]].

Master, the Skaven menace, Clan Mordkin, pose a threat to us. I advise we conquer their stronghold in this region. This will immediately weaken their position and strenghten our own.\n\nLearn more about settlements [[url:script_link_campaign_settlements]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_settlements}}]][[col:help_page_link]]here[[/col]][[/tooltip]][[/url]].

Muster your forces at the pass between Blightwater and the Devil's Backbone, we will push through the passage under the Charnel Valley, Arkhan the Black, and his forces will be waiting for us in the Ash Valley, where we will combine our Legions and march on the Black Pyramid and regain our former might.
March on the Black Pyramid, restore your true power and enact vengence on this weak world of the living.

Supreme Lord, the Black Pyarmid is yours, as it always has been, but we must move towards our goal of completing the Great Ritual, take the city of Khemri.\n\nLearn more about settlements [[url:script_link_campaign_settlements]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_settlements}}]][[col:help_page_link]]here[[/col]][[/tooltip]][[/url]].

Supreme Lord, the city of Mourgheim will be of great value to us, restore the home of the cult of Nagash to it's former glory, long live Mourkaine.\n\nLearn more about settlements [[url:script_link_campaign_settlements]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_settlements}}]][[col:help_page_link]]here[[/col]][[/tooltip]][[/url]].

Supreme and masterful Lord of the dead, Mannfred Von Carstein sits in his accursed citedal, both he and his holding would make for a great prize, take Castle Draknehof.\n\nLearn more about settlements [[url:script_link_campaign_settlements]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_settlements}}]][[col:help_page_link]]here[[/col]][[/tooltip]][[/url]].

Supreme Lord, your loyal servant Neferata has a singular goal retake the city of Lahmia, do this, restore the cult of blood and bring her unwavering focus towards your own plans.\n\nLearn more about settlements [[url:script_link_campaign_settlements]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_settlements}}]][[col:help_page_link]]here[[/col]][[/tooltip]][[/url]].

My sire, we have recieved a cryptic message from the port city of The Awakeing, we believe their leader Luthor Harkon would like to meet with you.\n\nLearn more about settlements [[url:script_link_campaign_settlements]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_settlements}}]][[col:help_page_link]]here[[/col]][[/tooltip]][[/url]].

My gracious Lord, in one of Luthors mad ramblings he mentioned a place of great power that will surely progress our completion of the Great Ritual, journey to the Titan Peaks, take the city of Quintex.\n\nLearn more about settlements [[url:script_link_campaign_settlements]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_settlements}}]][[col:help_page_link]]here[[/col]][[/tooltip]][[/url]].

My sire, we have recieved a cryptic message from the port city of The Awakeing, we believe their leader Luthor Harkon would like to meet with you.\n\nLearn more about settlements [[url:script_link_campaign_settlements]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_settlements}}]][[col:help_page_link]]here[[/col]][[/tooltip]][[/url]].
[PH - needs Advisor text] Restore the Audience Chamber and watch our worshippers flock to us
[PH - needs Advisor text] Vlad would make a powerful ally, find the Carstien Ring
